# init(instanceCount:)

**Initializer**

Creates a low-level instance data object with an instance count.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(instanceCount: Int) throws
```

## Parameters

- **instanceCount**: The number of instances in this instance data object.

## Discussion

This initializer also applies the instance count to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/LowLevelInstanceData/instanceCapacity].
title: init(instanceCount:)
